name: People.ai
headline: Harnesses business activity to unlock growth.
description:
People.ai accelerates enterprise growth through the power of AI.  Founded in 2016 on the premise that AI and machine learning technologies can help automate CRM functions that humans often leave behind, it has grown into a platform that powers actionable insights across go-to-market functions. The platform has become the cornerstone of decision-making for enterprises such as Zoom, PTC, and Hexagon PPM, eliminating guesswork to create an unprecedented level of intelligence for those and other businesses looking to grow and thrive in a competitive digital landscape.

People.ai does this by automating the ingestion of GTM data from primary sources like email systems. We then translate this information into actionable insights that help sellers, marketers, and operations leaders deliver more pipeline growth that leads directly into revenue and margin growth. We call it our next-generation revenue engine, which helps companies accelerate opportunities and close deals faster.

founders.name: Oleg Rogynskyy, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Oleg is the CEO and founder of People.ai, an AI platform that drives intelligence and optimization for go-to-market teams. He is a native of Ukraine and moved to the US in the early 2000s, where he got his degree from Boston University. 
In early 2016 Oleg founded People.ai. Within 30 days of launching the company, they were accepted to Y Combinator,  and have raised over $100 million, with rounds led by Lightspeed Venture Partners, Andreessen Horowitz and ICONIQ Capital.

# Power Successful ‍Sales Teams
Make your sales processes consistent, effective, and scalable with the AI data platform customized for your revenue team.
[Take the tour](https://people.ai/<javascript:void\(0\);>)
Trusted by big-time companies who win big-time revenue
![Cisco](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462847f605fb77f78b2ad89/66fab4ce1a7c924e3a07c8ae_Cisco%20logo.svg)
![Verizon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462847f605fb77f78b2ad89/66fab2f88f48c9e11ad34963_Verizon_2024.svg)
![Five9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462847f605fb77f78b2ad89/66fab548cbb608d3f86e51c3_Five9%20Logo.svg)

![Hexagon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462847f605fb77f78b2ad89/67a0cdc233aa2d84fd882b71_Hexagon%20logo.svg)
![Nvidia](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462847f605fb77f78b2ad89/67a35a1cf91592d197aebff6_Nvidia%20Base%20Logo.svg)
![Pluralsight](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462847f605fb77f78b2ad89/66faba8b8397e800404f4696_Pluralsight%20logo.svg)
![Iron Mountain](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462847f605fb77f78b2ad89/67a35ab3fb21de4c82dd4970_Iron%20Mountain%20Base%20Logo.svg)
OUR Approach
## Adopt a data-driven sales strategy and ditch
guessing instead of knowing
inaccurate forecasting
watching sellers struggle
chasing down information
missing quota
data spread across tools
longer sales cycles
late-stage deal slips
customer churn
### Forensics
**Capture** and unify all of your GTM data from seller activities and sales tools. Easily surface and share insights across your entire organization. Make better decisions that drive real results.
[Learn more->](https://people.ai/</solutions/forensics>)
### Account Execution
**Align** your account teams with automated, data-driven account strategies. Ensure repeatable success at scale, while better serving customers from pre-sale to post-sale, and through renewal.
[Learn more->](https://people.ai/</solutions/account-execution>)
### Opportunity Management
**Automate** deal qualification and easily visualize deal health to help move the right opportunities forward. Operate confidently and efficiently so you can win more revenue. 
[Learn more->](https://people.ai/</solutions/opportunity-management>)
### Forecast Accuracy
**Forecast** with confidence using facts instead of gut feelings. Dynamically manage pipeline, monitor account health in real-time. Proactively make changes before you miss your number.
Coming soon
## Give your sales team a winning edge on every deal.
### Sales Leaders
Stop running your sales team blind. Easily understand what’s working so you can level-up every seller. Achieve consistent, predictable results using one platform to run your entire sales organization.
### Revenue Operations
You’ve been running revenue using incomplete data for too long. Unify your GTM data to understand the why behind the numbers, scale revenue generating activities, and give your sellers a head start on every deal.
### Sellers
Remove the guesswork from hitting quota. Easily manage complex deals from a single solution. Proactively mitigate risk. Identify and engage key stakeholders in every account. Do all of this with automated workflows and less busywork.
### Sales Enablement
Your sellers aren't using your proven processes. Make account planning and opportunity management easier by automating the process. Use AI to help them find the path to closed won every time.
![Sales Enablement](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462847f605fb77f78b2ad89/67a1fe8baf1f9e3e64a8c7d7_accordion_4_enablement__2x.webp)

## Modernize the sales rituals that drive real results
Being busy is easy. Being effective is hard.
### 1.8M
sales activities captured per hour

forecast accuracy

#### PARTNERSHIPS

People.ai works seamlessly inside of Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales, Slack, Zoom, and more. No additional login required.

Why People.ai⟨3⟩

# Power Successful ‍Sales Teams
Make your sales processes consistent, effective, and scalable with the AI data platform customized for your revenue team.
Take the tour⟨37⟩;>)
Trusted by big-time companies who win big-time revenue
![Cisco⟨38⟩]
![Verizon⟨39⟩]
![Five9⟨40⟩]
![Okta⟨41⟩]
![Hexagon⟨42⟩]
![Nvidia⟨43⟩]
![Pluralsight⟨44⟩]
![Iron Mountain⟨45⟩]
OUR Approach
## Adopt a data-driven sales strategy and ditch
guessing instead of knowing
inaccurate forecasting
watching sellers struggle
chasing down information
missing quota
data spread across tools
longer sales cycles
late-stage deal slips
customer churn
### Forensics
**Capture** and unify all of your GTM data from seller activities and sales tools. Easily surface and share insights across your entire organization. Make better decisions that drive real results.
Learn more->⟨4⟩
### Account Execution
**Align** your account teams with automated, data-driven account strategies. Ensure repeatable success at scale, while better serving customers from pre-sale to post-sale, and through renewal.
Learn more->⟨5⟩
### Opportunity Management
**Automate** deal qualification and easily visualize deal health to help move the right opportunities forward. Operate confidently and efficiently so you can win more revenue. 
Learn more->⟨6⟩
### Forecast Accuracy
**Forecast** with confidence using facts instead of gut feelings. Dynamically manage pipeline, monitor account health in real-time. Proactively make changes before you miss your number.
Coming soon
## Give your sales team a winning edge on every deal.
### Sales Leaders
Stop running your sales team blind. Easily understand what’s working so you can level-up every seller. Achieve consistent, predictable results using one platform to run your entire sales organization.
### Revenue Operations
You’ve been running revenue using incomplete data for too long. Unify your GTM data to understand the why behind the numbers, scale revenue generating activities, and give your sellers a head start on every deal.
### Sellers
Remove the guesswork from hitting quota. Easily manage complex deals from a single solution. Proactively mitigate risk. Identify and engage key stakeholders in every account. Do all of this with automated workflows and less busywork.
### Sales Enablement
Your sellers aren't using your proven processes. Make account planning and opportunity management easier by automating the process. Use AI to help them find the path to closed won every time.
![Sales Enablement⟨46⟩]
![Sellers⟨47⟩]
![Revenue Operations⟨48⟩]
![Sales Leaders⟨49⟩]
### Join us to uncover AI’s impact on data security—and what GTM leaders must know before buying tech in 2025
Register now⟨50⟩
## Modernize the sales rituals that drive real results
Being busy is easy. Being effective is hard.
### 1.8M
sales activities captured per hour
![Cisco Logo⟨51⟩]
### 92%
forecast accuracy
![Unity⟨52⟩]
### 25%
increase in net new customer meetings
![Hexagon⟨53⟩]

generated_description:
**People.ai Summary**

**Mission**: People.ai is on a mission to harness business activity to unlock growth, fundamentally changing how enterprises utilize data to drive revenue and engagement.

**Background**: Founded in 2016 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S16, People.ai set out to enhance enterprise growth through artificial intelligence. Initially focused on automating CRM functions often overlooked by humans, it has now evolved into a comprehensive platform delivering actionable insights across various go-to-market (GTM) functions. Major enterprise clients, including Zoom, PTC, and Hexagon PPM, rely on People.ai to eliminate guesswork and enhance decision-making, allowing them to thrive in a competitive digital market.

**How It Works**: People.ai automates the capture of GTM data from major sources like email systems, translating vast amounts of information into actionable insights. These insights empower sellers, marketers, and operations leaders to generate a more robust sales pipeline and drive both revenue and margin growth. Their proprietary technology is dubbed a "next-generation revenue engine," designed to accelerate opportunities and help organizations close deals more efficiently.

**Location & Team**: Headquartered in San Francisco, People.ai boasts a talented team of around 300 employees, led by Group Partner Michael Seibel.

**Expertise Tags**: The company is recognized for its innovations in artificial intelligence, software as a service (SaaS), and its strong foothold in the enterprise technology sector in the San Francisco Bay Area. 

**Current Offerings**: People.ai provides a suite of solutions tailored to various industries and use cases, including:
- **Forensics**: Capturing and unifying GTM data to provide shared insights.
- **Account Execution**: Automating data-driven account strategies for consistent success.
- **Opportunity Management**: Visualizing deal health and qualifications for more efficient utilization of resources. 

Their products, like SalesAI, offer functionalities that enhance the sales process and unify engaging interactions with a seamless user experience across platforms like Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales, and Slack.

**Contact Info & Resources**: 
- Website: [People.ai](https://people.ai)
- For insights into how People.ai can improve your business outcomes, consider requesting a demo or checking out customer success stories featured on their site.

In conclusion, People.ai is positioned as an essential partner for enterprises aiming to modernize their GTM strategies through innovative use of AI and data, turning everyday business activities into drivers of growth.
